_http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=140646866045_ 
(http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=140646866045) 
 
 
I lowered the price, because i was able to get a couple radios  cheaper.  
It's not about the money, it's about getting good sweeping ghost  boxes to 
researchers that can use them.
 
You won't find a better adjustable sweep ghost box cheaper than this that  
is homemade, small and portable.
 
-Steve 
 
 
 
 
Steve Hultay
_www.keyportparanormal.com_ (http://www.keyportparanormal.com/)
